```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tadaatoolbox)
```

# `tadaa_aov`

```{r aov}
tadaa_aov(deutsch ~ jahrgang * geschl, data = ngo, type = 1, print = "markdown")
tadaa_aov(deutsch ~ jahrgang * geschl, data = ngo, type = 2, print = "markdown")
tadaa_aov(deutsch ~ jahrgang * geschl, data = ngo, type = 3, print = "markdown")
```

# `tadaa_t.test`

```{r t_test}
tadaa_t.test(data = ngo, response = deutsch, group = geschl, print = "markdown")
tadaa_t.test(data = ngo, response = deutsch, group = geschl, direction = "less", print = "markdown")
```

# `tadaa_wilcoxon`

```{r wilcoxon}
df <- data.frame(x = runif(100), y = sample(c("A", "B"), 100, TRUE))
tadaa_wilcoxon(df, x, y, print = "markdown")
tadaa_wilcoxon(df, x, y, direction = "less", print = "markdown")

df <- data.frame(x = runif(100), y = c(rep("A", 50), rep("B", 50)))
tadaa_wilcoxon(df, x, y, paired = TRUE, print = "markdown")
```
